author: ABC News
title: Winter storm brings biting cold to much of US
text:
Winter storm brings biting cold to much of US
The system will stretch 1,500 miles from Kansas to the Northeast, bringing brutal cold across half the country through the weekend and into next week. Some temperatures will dip below zero.
January 2, 2025

author: Warren Squire
title: Going for the Joe Biden Vote? Trump Floats Presidential Pardon of Hunter if Elected
text: President Donald Trump floated the idea of actually pardoning Hunter Biden on Hugh Hewitt's video podcast today. He didn't totally commit to giving a 'Get Out of Jail, Free' card to the infamous son of President Joe Biden, but says it's something he'll consider. Hunter has a long list of federal convictions and charges involving not only an illegal gun purchase but also taxes. Hunter's laptop, which was suppressed by Biden-friendly 'news' orgs during the 2020 election, still has Trump voters angry and seeking justice. Hear Trump explain it. (WATCH) NOW - Trump, on pardoning Hunter Biden: "I wouldn't take it off the books." â€” Disclose.tv (@disclosetv)[pic.twitter.com/TDT8i2sQ9t][October 24, 2024] Wow, that was unexpected. This pardon-talk has some questioning Trump but others see it as a smart move considering how Democrats are falsely painting Trump as an unforgiving 'dictator'. This person sees through the Dem lies. But I thought he was trying to prosecute his political enemies?! Oh wait, that was just the dems projecting what they have done â€” MAGAhombreðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ (@MAGAhombre2024)[October 24, 2024] Projecting is a Democratic Party specialty. 'Journalists' and their fellow Dems have pulled out another tired trope in hopes of spoiling a Trump election victory. It's not working. The joke's on Dems, again. Wow, literally Hitler. â€” David Giglio (@DavidGiglioCA)[October 24, 2024] Is Trump being truthful? Politically cautious? He had a chance to pursue charges against Hillary Clinton after he trounced her presidential dreams in 2016 but for the sake of the country he didn't. That didn't stop Hillary and the Dems from seeking vengeance though. Looks like Trump played his cards right in the interview. He answered the question probably as best as he could. Should he have said he wouldnâ€™t pardon Hunter?? That would have just reiterated the Demsâ€™ talking point of Trump going after his political enemies. The Dems wouldâ€™ve played that clip over and over again until the election. â€” Jules (@Jules7547)[October 24, 2024] So now there's less real fuel for the media's fire, not that they won't create their own. The media will continue to portray Trump as a divider, despite it not being true. But, if he's willing to spare the son of a political rival who has tried to jail and destroy him, Trump may just be the unifier-in-chief this country needs.

organizations.name: Trump Floats Presidential Pardon of Hunter

author: carmenmilagros.martincastillo
title: HamÃ¡s acepta propuesta de alto el fuego en la Franja de Gaza
text: HamÃ¡s acepta propuesta de alto el fuego en la Franja de Gaza De acuerdo con el comunicado, el lÃ­der polÃ­tico de HamÃ¡s, Ismail Haniye, informÃ³ la decisiÃ³n al primer ministro catarÃ­, Mohamed bin Abdel Rahman Al Thani, y al jefe de la inteligencia egipcia, Abas Kamel, en una llamada telefÃ³nica. Catar y Egipto, como mediadores, estuvieron durante meses conversando con las partes, intentando alcanzar un acuerdo. Altos funcionarios israelÃ­es afirmaron que la propuesta de alto el fuego no contaba con aportaciones de Israel y no es aceptable. Uno de ellos, segÃºn el diario Maariv, dijo que â€œestamos esperando detalles. Examinaremos la respuesta de HamÃ¡s y trataremos de entender por quÃ© Hamas estuvo de acuerdoâ€. Un alto funcionario de HamÃ¡s dijo a France Press que â€œdespuÃ©s de que HamÃ¡s ha aceptado la propuesta de los mediadores de un alto el fuego, la pelota estÃ¡ ahora en el tejado de la ocupaciÃ³n israelÃ­, ya sea que acepte el acuerdo de alto el fuego o lo obstruyaâ€. El anuncio coincide con la evacuaciÃ³n del este de la ciudad de Rafah, al sur de Gaza, ordenada por Israel. Los detalles de la propuesta todavÃ­a no han sido informados. Funcionarios egipcios y de HamÃ¡s han afirmado que un posible alto el fuego se producirÃ­a en varias fases, en las que HamÃ¡s liberarÃ­a a prisioneros israelÃ­es a cambio de la retirada de tropas de Gaza. No se ha determinado si el acuerdo cumplirÃ¡ las principales exigencias de HamÃ¡s: un alto el fuego permanente, la retirada completa de Israel de Gaza y el regreso de las familias desplazadas a sus hogares.

author: Bryan Ke
title: Cup Noodles debuts new flavor: Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese
text: Cup Noodles debuts new flavor: Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese Nissin Foods USA announced it will be releasing its newest ramen flavor, Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese, next week. Key points: [Nissin](/tag/nissin)unveiled the new product in a [press release](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/cup-noodles-everything-bagel-with-cream-cheese-takes-a-bite-out-of-bagel-culture-302105912.html)on Tuesday. The company also teased the Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese [Cup Noodle](/tag/cup-noodles)in a post on - The latest product is seemingly a follow-up to the companyâ€™s [breakfast-themed flavor](/nissin-cup-noodles-breakfast)from 2023, the Maple Syrup Pancakes, Sausage and Egg Cup Noodles. The details: - The new Cup Noodle product incorporates the trendy everything bagel seasoning inside the serving, which contains sesame seeds, poppy seeds, garlic, dried onion and caraway seeds. - The new ramen contains a cream-cheese flavored sauce, making the instant dish saucy instead of soup-based. - â€œConsumers have been adding a dash of Everything Seasoning to their ramen since the craze took off and we took inspiration from our consumer base to give everyoneâ€™s favorite noodles a creamy twist,â€ Priscila Stanton, Nissin Foods senior vice president of marketing said. - The new Cup Noodle variant was announced as being exclusively available at [Walmart](/tag/walmart)next week. - The Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese Cup Noodle is available for a suggested retail price of $1.18. How people reacted: - Some Instagram usersâ€™ reaction were split between disbelief and optimism, with one user writing, â€œMost normal cup noodle post.â€ Another user commented under Nissinâ€™s post, â€œThis might smack.â€ - One user thought the post was Nissinâ€™s attempt to pull off an April Foolsâ€™ prank, commenting, â€œApril fools is over!! smh lol.â€ - â€œImagine if the og cup noodles had THE og cream cheese in this,â€ Philadelphia Original cream cheeseâ€™s Instagram page commented. Share this Article Share this Article

author: NDTV
title: Ground News - YouTuber Sued Over 'How Ram Rahim Made A Fool Of His Followers' Video
text:
Summary by NDTV The Delhi High Court on Friday issued notice on a suit for injunction filed by Dera Sacha Sauda chief Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh against Youtuber Shyam Meera Singh. Gurmeet Ram Rahim has sought a direction for deletion of a video uploaded by Mr Singh. Vacation Justice Shailender Kaur issued notice on the petition moved by Ram Rahim against Shyam Meera Singh and listed the matter for hearing on Saturday. He has also sought direction to Shyam Meera Sâ€¦ Share menu More

author: @UnioneSarda
title: Padre, madre e un bimbo  uccisi dal monossido Gravissima la sorellina  - L'Unione Sarda.it
text:
FIRENZE. Tre morti, due adulti e un ragazzino di 11 anni, e una bimba di 6 anni ricoverata in gravissime condizioni, con ogni probabilitÃ  a causa del monossido di carbonio. Il dramma si Ã¨ consumato in una villa a San Felice a Ema, una zona residenziale di pregio a ridosso di Firenze. A scoprire la tragedia sono stati i vigili del fuoco dopo che lâ€™ex moglie dellâ€™uomo, proprietario dellâ€™abitazione, aveva dato lâ€™allarme al 118 perchÃ© non aveva risposte dai familiari. Le tre vittime sono il 49enne Matteo Racheli, suo figlio figlio Elio e la compagna Margarida Alcione, 46enne di origine sudamericana. In gravi condizioni allâ€™ospedale pediatrico Meyer Ã¨ invece ricoverata la figlia della coppia.
Sul divano
I vigili del fuoco sono arrivati sul posto con le squadre specializzate Nbcr attorno alle 14, quando hanno aperto la porta si sono trovati di fronte una famiglia distrutta: lâ€™uomo con i due bambini era sul divano mentre la donna era in terra a poca distanza da loro, probabilmente ha perso i sensi mentre era in movimento. Secondo i pompieri, molto probabilmente non si sono accorti di nulla. I quattro sono stati subito portati fuori, dove sono partite le manovre di rianimazione, ma per tre di loro si sono rivelate inutili. Per la bimba, rianimata allâ€™esterno della casa, una corsa disperata in ospedale. Oltre a soccorritori e pompieri, alla villa sono arrivati agenti di polizia, operatori della scientifica, carabinieri e agenti della polizia municipale per regolare la viabilitÃ . Ieri sera era ancora da ufficializzare lâ€™incidente che ha causato la tragedia. Nellâ€™abitazione gli investigatori, oltre alla caldaia, hanno individuato alcune stufe a pellet. Nel tardo pomeriggio sono arrivati anche alcuni parenti delle vittime e la presidente del Quartiere 3 di Firenze, Serena Perini. La coppia, secondo quanto riferito da un vicino, non abitava lÃ¬ da molto, forse un paio dâ€™anni. Dentro lâ€™appartamento, riferiscono i vigili del fuoco, si trovava anche un gatto che si Ã¨ salvato, cosÃ¬ come un cane che perÃ² era allâ€™esterno. Le vittime sono state ricordate in serata dalla sindaca di Firenze Sara Funaro, a margine della cerimonia degli auguri di Natale alla cittÃ : Â«Questo Ã¨ un momento di dolore perchÃ© câ€™Ã¨ stata una tragedia nella nostra cittÃ , in un appartamento dove una coppia e un bambino non ci sono piÃ¹ e una bimba Ã¨ in gravi condizioni - ha detto la prima cittadina - Stiamo seguendo questa vicenda, ci stringiamo intorno alla famiglia. Oltre a portare gli auguri alla cittÃ  che Ã¨ una emozione, câ€™Ã¨ anche un senso di doloreÂ».
